sections.heading: Commissions; conviction of felony; effect; fingerprints
sections.text: No one may be appointed as an officer who has been convicted of a felony. Fingerprints of all officers shall be taken.SourceLaws 1941, c. 116, ยง 1, p. 447;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 55-401;Laws 1943, c. 126, ยง 1, p. 428;R.S.1943, ยง 55-204;Laws 1969, c.
